File_System_API.summary: The File System API — with extensions provided via the File System Access API to access files on the device file system — allows read, write and file management capabilities.

remarks.para: See Relationship to other file-related APIs for a comparison between this API, the File and Directory Entries API, and the File API.

-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files
-The origin private file system

File_System_APIOrigin_private_file_syste.summary: The origin private file system (OPFS) is a storage endpoint provided as part of the File System API, which is private to the origin of the page and not visible to the user like the regular file system. It provides access to a special kind of file that is highly optimized for performance and offers in-place write access to its content.

remarks.para: -The origin private file system on web.dev
